title: revival
comment: The soveriegn activity of God whereby he renews his people individually and corporately in vigour, affecting both sincerity of belief and quality of behaviour.

children.title: revival, nature of
children.comment: Scripture indicates that a number of characteristics precede revival, including repentance, humility and obedience.

revival, personal
children.comment: The bringing back of individuals to life or vigour both at the point of personal regeneration through the work of the Holy Spirit and at other times in believers' lives.

children.title: revival, corporate
children.comment: The experience of God's people both in the OT and NT when prayer is answered and their growth and effectiveness are renewed.
